author: nicolaken
msg: Fixed bug that showed the krysalis-site skin in IE browsers from
a remote site to start with a font size of 100.
Also made the font size script kick in at the start of the
page rendering, as before it resized only after all the page
was loaded, which was not nice to say the least.

author: jefft
msg: Don't process the figure title after it has already been used. Thanks to Juan

author: jefft
msg: Stylesheet for converting DirectoryGenerator output to Forrest's book.xml
format.  Allows the automatic generation of menus.

author: jefft
msg: Break long lines so we don't get horizontal wrap (at least on my 17")
